00004         : modelfile (modelfile)

00016 void CalibModel::onMouse(int event, int x, int y, int flags)
00017 {
00018         if (event == CV_EVENT_LBUTTONDOWN) {
00019                 // try to grab something
00020                 grab = -1;
00021                 for (int i=0; i<4; i++) {
00022                         int dx = x-corners[i].x;
00023                         int dy = y-corners[i].y;
00024                         if (sqrt((double)(dx*dx+dy*dy)) <10) {
00025                                 grab = i;
00026                                 break;
00027                         }
00028                 }
00029         }
00030         
00031         if (grab!=-1) {
00032                 corners[grab].x = x;
00033                 corners[grab].y = y;
00034         }
00035 
00036         if (event == CV_EVENT_LBUTTONUP) {
00037                 grab=-1;
00038         }
00039 }

00041 bool CalibModel::buildCached(int nbcam, CvCapture *capture, bool cache, planar_object_recognizer &detector)
00042 {
00043 
00044         detector.ransac_dist_threshold = 5;
00045         detector.max_ransac_iterations = 800;
00046         detector.non_linear_refine_threshold = 1.5;
00047 
00048         // A lower threshold will allow detection in harder conditions, but
00049         // might lead to false positives.
00050         detector.match_score_threshold=.03f;
00051 
00052         detector.min_view_rate=.1;
00053         detector.views_number = 100;
00054 
00055         // Should we train or load the classifier ?
00056         if(cache && detector.build_with_cache(
00057                                 string(modelfile), // mode image file name
00058                                 500,               // maximum number of keypoints on the model
00059                                 32,                // patch size in pixels
00060                                 3,                 // yape radius. Use 3,5 or 7.
00061                                 16,                // number of trees for the classifier. Somewhere between 12-50
00062                                 3                  // number of levels in the gaussian pyramid
00063                                 ))
00064         {
00065                 // loading worked. Remember the region of interest.
00066                 corners[0].x = detector.new_images_generator.u_corner1;
00067                 corners[0].y = detector.new_images_generator.v_corner1;
00068                 corners[1].x = detector.new_images_generator.u_corner2;
00069                 corners[1].y = detector.new_images_generator.v_corner2;
00070                 corners[2].x = detector.new_images_generator.u_corner3;
00071                 corners[2].y = detector.new_images_generator.v_corner3;
00072                 corners[3].x = detector.new_images_generator.u_corner4;
00073                 corners[3].y = detector.new_images_generator.v_corner4;
00074                 image = cvLoadImage(modelfile, cvQueryFrame(capture)->nChannels == 3);
00075         } else {
00076                 // ask the user the take a shot of the model
00077                 if (!interactiveSetup(capture)) return false;
00078 
00079                 // train the classifier to detect this model
00080                 if (!detector.build(image, 400, 32, 3, 16, 3,0, 0))
00081                         return false;
00082 
00083                 // save the image
00084                 if (!cvSaveImage(modelfile, image)) return false;
00085 
00086                 // and the region of interest (ROI)
00087                 string roifn = string(modelfile) + ".roi";
00088                 ofstream roif(roifn.c_str());
00089                 if (!roif.good()) return false;
00090                 for (int i=0;i<4; i++) 
00091                         roif << corners[i].x << " " << corners[i].y << "\n";
00092                 roif.close();
00093 
00094                 // and the trained classifier
00095                 detector.save(string(modelfile)+".classifier");
00096         }
00097 
00098         float cn[4][2];
00099         for (int i=0; i<4; i++) {
00100                 cn[i][0] = corners[i].x;
00101                 cn[i][1] = corners[i].y;
00102         }
00103 
00104         // prepare the light calibration reference
00105         return map.init(nbcam, image, cn, 8, 6);
00106 }

00108 static void putText(IplImage *im, const char *text, CvPoint p, CvFont *f1, CvFont *f2)
00109 {
00110         cvPutText(im,text,p,f2, cvScalarAll(0));
00111         cvPutText(im,text,p,f1, cvScalar(0,255, 255));
00112 }

00114 
00115 IplImage *myRetrieveFrame(CvCapture *capture)
00116 {
00117         static IplImage *s=0;
00118         IplImage *frame =cvRetrieveFrame(capture);
00119         if (frame == 0) return 0;
00120         IplImage *ret=frame;
00121         if (frame->nChannels==1) {
00122                 if (!s) s=cvCreateImage(cvSize(frame->width,frame->height), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
00123                 cvCvtColor(frame,s,CV_GRAY2BGR);
00124                 ret = s;
00125         }
00126         if (ret->origin) {
00127                 if (!s) s=cvCreateImage(cvSize(frame->width,frame->height), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
00128                 cvFlip(ret, s);
00129                 ret->origin=0;
00130                 ret = s;
00131         }
00132         return ret;
00133 }
00134 IplImage *myQueryFrame(CvCapture *capture)
00135 {
00136         cvGrabFrame(capture);
00137         return myRetrieveFrame(capture);
00138 }

00142 bool CalibModel::interactiveSetup(CvCapture *capture)
00143 {
00144 
00145         CvFont font, fontbold;
00146 
00147         cvInitFont( &font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, 1, 1);
00148         cvInitFont( &fontbold, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, 1, 1, 0, 5);
00149 
00150         cvNamedWindow(win, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00151         grab=-1;
00152         
00153         objectPtr = this;
00154         cvSetMouseCallback(win, onMouseStatic, this);
00155 
00156         bool pause=false;
00157         IplImage *frame = myQueryFrame(capture);
00158         IplImage *shot=0, *text=0;
00159 
00160         state = TAKE_SHOT;
00161 
00162         bool accepted =false;
00163         while (!accepted) {
00164 
00165                 // wait for a key
00166                 char k = cvWaitKey(10);
00167 
00168                 if (k==27 || k=='q') {
00169                         if (shot) cvReleaseImage(&shot);
00170                         if (text) cvReleaseImage(&text);
00171                         return false;
00172                 }
00173 
00174                 // clear text or grab the image to display
00175                 if (!pause || shot==0) {
00176                         frame = myQueryFrame(capture);
00177                         if (!text) {
00178                                 text=cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
00179                                 int d = 30;
00180                                 corners[0].x = d;
00181                                 corners[0].y = d;
00182                                 corners[1].x = frame->width-d;
00183                                 corners[1].y = d;
00184                                 corners[2].x = frame->width-d;
00185                                 corners[2].y = frame->height-d;
00186                                 corners[3].x = d;
00187                                 corners[3].y = frame->height-d;
00188                         } 
00189                         if (frame->nChannels==1)
00190                                 cvCvtColor(frame, text, CV_GRAY2BGR);
00191                         else 
00192                                 cvCopy(frame,text);
00193                 } else {
00194                         if (shot->nChannels==1)
00195                                 cvCvtColor(shot, text, CV_GRAY2BGR);
00196                         else
00197                                 cvCopy(shot, text);
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 // display text / react to keyboard
00201                 switch (state) {
00202                         default:
00203                         case TAKE_SHOT:
00204                                 if (k==' ') {
00205                                         if (shot) cvCopy(frame,shot);
00206                                         else shot = cvCloneImage(frame);
00207                                         pause = true;
00208                                         state = CORNERS;
00209                                         k=-1;
00210                                 } else {
00211                                         putText(text,"Please take a frontal view", cvPoint(3,20), &font, &fontbold);
00212                                         putText(text,"of a textured planar surface", cvPoint(3,40), &font, &fontbold);
00213                                         putText(text,"and press space", cvPoint(3,60), &font, &fontbold);
00214                                         break;
00215                                 }
00216                         case CORNERS:
00217                                         putText(text, "Drag corners to match the", cvPoint(3,20), &font, &fontbold);
00218                                         putText(text, "calibration target", cvPoint(3,40), &font, &fontbold);
00219                                         putText(text, "press 'r' to restart", cvPoint(3,60), &font, &fontbold);
00220                                         putText(text, "press space when ready", cvPoint(3,80), &font, &fontbold);
00221                                         if (k=='r') {
00222                                                 pause = false;
00223                                                 state = TAKE_SHOT;
00224                                         }
00225                                         if (k==' ') {
00226                                                 accepted=true;
00227                                         }
00228                                         int four = 4;
00229                                         CvPoint *ptr = corners;
00230                                         cvPolyLine(text, &ptr, &four, 1, 1,
00231                                                         cvScalar(0,255,0));
00232                                         break;
00233                 }
00234                 cvShowImage(win, text);
00235         }
00236 
00237         cvReleaseImage(&text);
00238         image = shot;
00239         return true;
00240 }
00241 
00242 void CalibModel::onMouseStatic(int event, int x, int y, int flags, void* param)
00243 {
00244         if (param)
00245                 ((CalibModel *)param)->onMouse(event,x,y,flags);
00246         if (objectPtr)
00247                 objectPtr->onMouse(event,x,y,flags);
00248         else
00249                 cerr << "onMouseStatic(): null-pointer.\n";
00250 }
